timeline.bodyText: Is it possible that the resultset is empty here? If it is, should we throw an exception or it is a legit scenario?
timeline.author: ulvii

replies.bodyText: It shouldn't happen but something can go wrong, we can throw an exception.

timeline.message: throw exception if 3rd resultset is empty
